mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM project_list WHERE approve_stat = "accept"
SELECT * FROM project_list WHERE approve_stat = "request" ORDER BY project_date DESC LIMIT #{startRow} ,#{listLimit}

SELECT project_list.project_code, project_list.project_title, project_list.representative_picture, project_list.delete_stat, project_date.open_start_date, project_date.open_end_date, project_date.project_start_date, project_date.project_end_date FROM project_list INNER JOIN project_date ON project_list.project_code = project_date.project_code ORDER BY project_list.project_date DESC LIMIT #{startRow} ,#{listLimit}

SELECT project_list.project_title, project_list.representative_picture, project_list.service_type, project_info.category, project_info.sub_category, project_info.adult_check, project_info.target_amount FROM project_list INNER JOIN project_info ON project_list.project_code = project_info.project_code WHERE project_list.project_code = #{projectCode}
SELECT maker_type, registration_card, representative_name, representative_email, business_name, business_number FROM project_info WHERE project_code = #{projectCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE project_list SET approve_stat = 'accept', approved_date = NOW() WHERE project_code = #{project_code}
UPDATE project_list SET approve_stat = 'deny', approved_date = NOW() WHERE project_code = #{project_code}
UPDATE project_list SET delete_stat = 'Y' WHERE project_code = #{projectCode}
UPDATE project_list SET delete_stat = 'N' WHERE project_code = #{projectCode}
